comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This image is part of the Indicommons.org tribute to New York City on its *400th* anniversary.

comment.author: 26315450@N06
comment._content: You can see the shock in his face! New York traffic!

comment.author: 87591604@N00
comment._content: This same type of shot was done for Ralph Kramden and the HoneyMooners Show....with Jackie Gleason playing the part of a bus driver on that famous tv show that took place in Bensonhurst...NYC...you see Ralph hanging out of the bus..just like this photo........
